alert.note: Alert for Dodge; Telfair; Wilcox (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 18 at 9:30AM EST until January 20 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Georgia... Ocmulgee River at Abbeville affecting Dodge, Telfair and Wilcox Counties. ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Georgia... Oconee River near Mount Vernon affecting Treutlen, Wheeler and Montgomery Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL SATURDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding will continue. * WHERE...Ocmulgee River at Abbeville.Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 13.8 feet on 03/15/2003. * WHEN...Until Saturday evening. * IMPACTS...At 14 feet, Moderate flooding begins. Roads to homes along the west side of the river in Abbeville become inaccessible. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:45 AM EST Thursday the stage was 13.8 feet and falling. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 8:45 AM EST Thursday was 14.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage early Saturday afternoon and continue falling to 9.1 feet Tuesday morning. - Flood stage is 12 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at weather.gov/atlanta. The next update will be issued this evening at 930 PM EST.
